verses.verse: These things <S%G5023><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> lifting up <S%G1869><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, he <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, the hour <S%G5610><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%>; glorify <S%G1392><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G4675><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> may <S%G2532><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>:

even as <S%G2531><s%> thou gavest <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> authority over <S%G1849><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> to all <S%G846><s%> whom <S%G3956><s%> thou <S%G3739><s%> hast given <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, he should give <S%G1325><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they should know <S%G1097><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> the only <S%G3441><s%> true <S%G228><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> him whom <S%G3739><s%> thou didst send <S%G649><s%>, even Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, having accomplished <S%G5048><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> do <S%G4160><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, glorify <S%G1392><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> thine own self <S%G4572><s%> with the glory <S%G1391><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I had <S%G2192><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> was <S%G1511><s%>.

I manifested <S%G5319><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> unto the men <S%G444><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> thou gavest <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>: thine <S%G4674><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou gavest <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to me <S%G1698><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they have kept <S%G5083><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> word <S%G3056><s%>.

Now <S%G3568><s%> they know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>:

for <S%G3754><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou gavest <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> I have given <S%G1325><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> them <S%G2532><s%>, and knew <S%G1097><s%> of a truth <S%G230><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I came forth <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they believed <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> didst send <S%G649><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> pray <S%G2065><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: I pray <S%G2065><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> those whom <S%G3739><s%> thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> thine <S%G4671><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things that are mine <S%G1699><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> thine <S%G4674><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thine <S%G4674><s%> are mine <S%G1699><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> I am glorified <S%G1392><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>. Holy <S%G40><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>, keep <S%G5083><s%> them in <S%G1722><s%> thy name <S%G3686><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they <S%G846><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are <S%G5600><s%>.

While <S%G3753><s%> I was <S%G2252><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, 1722, 2889 I <S%G1473><s%> kept <S%G5083><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>: and I guarded <S%G5442><s%> them <S%G2532><s%>, and not one <S%G3762><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> perished <S%G622><s%>, but1487, 3361 the son <S%G5207><s%> of perdition <S%G684><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%>.

But now <S%G3568><s%> I <S%G2064><s%> come to <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I <S%G2064><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they may have <S%G2192><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> made full <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> have given <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> word <S%G3056><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>.

I pray <S%G2065><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thou shouldest take <S%G142><s%> them <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thou shouldest keep <S%G5083><s%> them <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the evil one <S%G4190><s%>.
They are <S%G1526><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>.
Sanctify <S%G37><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G4675><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>: thy <S%G4674><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>.

As <S%G2531><s%> thou didst send <S%G649><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, even so <S%G2504><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> I them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> their sakes <S%G846><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> sanctify <S%G37><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they <S%G846><s%> themselves also <S%G2532><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> sanctified <S%G37><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>.

Neither <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> do I <S%G2065><s%> pray <S%G235><s%>, but for <S%G4012><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> that believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> their <S%G846><s%> word <S%G3056><s%>;

that <S%G2443><s%> they may all <S%G3956><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>; even as <S%G2531><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, art in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, and I <S%G2504><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may be5600, 1520 in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>: that <S%G2443><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> may believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> didst send <S%G649><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have given <S%G1325><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> they may be <S%G5600><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>;

I <S%G1473><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they may be <S%G5600><s%> perfected <S%G5048><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>; <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> may know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> didst send <S%G649><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> lovedst <S%G25><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> thou lovedst <S%G25><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>.

Father <S%G3962><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> desire <S%G2309><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they also <S%G2548><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they may behold <S%G2334><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> thou lovedst <S%G25><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>.

O righteous <S%G1342><s%> Father <S%G2532><s%>, the world2889, Genesis97 knew <S%G1097><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> didst send <S%G649><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> I made known <S%G1107><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> will make it known <S%G1107><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> wherewith <S%G3739><s%> thou lovedst <S%G25><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and I <S%G2504><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.
